mapper.select: select * from review where bookNo = #{bookNo} order by reviewDate
mapper.insert: insert into review( reviewId, memberId, reviewDate, content, bookNo, rating) values((select * from (select max(reviewId) +1 from review) next), #{memberId}, sysdate(), #{content}, #{bookNo}, #{rating})
mapper.update: update review set content = #{content}, reviewDate = sysdate() where reviewId = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: select round(avg(rating),1) as AvgRating from review where bookNo = #{bookNo}
select count(bookNo) as ratingNum from review where bookNo = #{bookNo}
